summary: Young engineer Francesco Ferraro is sent to Smeraldo Island in the Seychelles to oversee the tests necessary to dig a silver mine. But Francesco must also find out what happened to his predecessor, vanished without trace.
cast: Laura Gemser|Enzo Bottesini|Venantino Venantini|Ugo Cardea|Olga Bisera|Ogilvy Chiffon|Rocky Laurence|Lorenzo Piani|Paila Pavese
title: Amore libero - Free Love
